abstract.text: Apply a menu that lists all the locales in the keyboard
context as custom views.
Apply keyboard button gestures to the view, that should
trigger the provided gestures action.
Apply a keyboard layout item size to the view.
Apply a menu that lists all the locales in the keyboard
context as a
view with the full localized name.
Apply a keyboard button style to the view.
KeyboardKit helps you create custom keyboards for iOS and iPadOS, using Swift and SwiftUI.
This button makes any view behave as a next keyboard button,
which switches to the next keyboard when tapped and opens a
keyboard switcher menu when pressed.
This view modifier can be used to apply a light or dark
keyboard appearance to a text input.
Apply a keyboard input callout to the view.
Apply a keyboard action and input callout to the view.
Prepare the view with preview environments.
Apply a keyboard action callout to the view.
This view modifier can be applied to any view, to honor
by disabling autocorrect in
the provided context.
Apply a keyboard button style and gestures to the view.
Apply a keyboard callout shadow to the view.
